title: Remodeled 3br By Northwestern Central Air, InUnit Laundry Start 9/1/22
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Lease starts 9/1/2022!! Call of text Tim at (847) 424-0357  Newley Renovated!  Apartment Features: -Central Air -In-Unit Laundry -Dishwasher -Stainless Steel Appliances -Microwave -Quartz Countertops -Oak Cabinets -Hardwood Floors throughout  Building Features: -Intercom Secured Entry -On-Site Laundry -On-Site Management and Maintenance  Parking Available!  This newly renovated Evanston apartment is just Steps to Northwestern University Campus! Across the street from the Civic Center, and just A 5min walk to the Noyes Purple Line Train Stop!  2nd month rent free for qualified applicants signing a 2 year lease!
